listing.listing_description:
All bookings with travel dates taking place after January 1st 2019, will be subject to a 4.712% General Excise Tax & a 10.25% Transient Accommodations Tax. All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.

Let the near-constant sunshine and warm ocean breezes lull you into the aloha spirit at Kamilo 329. Part of the exclusive Kamilo community at the Mauna Lani Resort, this newly built luxury vacation rental on the Big Island of Hawaii will charm you with its views of the mountains and golf course, and convenient location. Four suite-style bedrooms, including one in a separate guest house, give you resort-worthy comfort in a private home setting.

Guests of the villa are welcome to use the Kamilo community’s shared pools, fitness center, hot tubs and barbecue pavilion, as well as the Mauna Lani Resort’s beach club. If you’d like, you can also arrange to use the Mauna Lani golf club, tennis courts, and sports club. Of course, the villa also has its own inviting outdoor living area with shaded sitting and dining areas, a sunny terrace with lounge chairs, a pool and hot tub, and a barbecue where you can entertain family, sample local seafood or simply relax.

Laid out around an open-plan great room, Kamilo 329 uses a palette of beachy tones to stylish modern effect. Sand-colored tile floors and a woven-paneled vaulted ceiling set a tropical theme that’s enhanced by blue coral-print pillows on the sofas and wicker dining chairs. The fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar and is open to the great room as well as a television lounge, so grown-ups can keep an eye on kids watching a movie as they prep dinner.

There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house and one in a separate guest house; each has an en-suite bathroom. In the main house, there are two bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. The guest house, which could be used as a tucked-away space for in-laws or even a honeymoon suite, has a king bed.

Begin your Hawaiian holiday with a flight into Kona International Airport, 22 miles from the villa, or Hilo International Airport, 72 miles away. Once you’ve arrived in Kamilo, you can walk to the grocery store or the Mauna Lani restaurants and shops, all about 15 minutes away. It’s a 5-minute drive to the resort’s sports club and the nearest oceanfront golf course, a 1.5-mile drive to the Mauna Lani Beach Club and a 7-mile drive to the golden sands and snorkeling of Hapuna Beach State Park. While you’re on the Big Island, it’s worth exploring Waimea, Kailua-Kona and Kohala to sample the local flavors—especially the famous coffee—and browse for souvenirs.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Wake up to the sound of singing birds at the neighborhood’s most prestigious property, right along the Noosa Parade waterway. Follow the fresh sea breeze down to the private jetty and sip Nespresso with your feet dangling in the canal. Then, spend the afternoon watching the sailboats pass by from a sun lounger. If you feel like shopping, walk over to the boutiques on Hastings Streets.

Floor-to-ceiling entrances span the terrace and leading the breeze into the white living room. Decorated with modern furnishings and contemporary works of art, 12 Noosa is the perfect spot for a celebration, backyard barbecue, and late-nights with old friends. The main level’s kitchen will surely inspire your inner chef. And, the open atmosphere unites each area of the living space, so whether you’re cooking, watching a rugby match, or sitting back in a sun lounger, you’ll be part of the group.

Start your morning with a stroll through the winding trails and scenic lookouts of Noosa National Park. Remember to pack yourself a light lunch to enjoy from a scenic perch or down at a picnic table in the foothills. After, head to Sunrise beach, located between the coral reef system and the park. For dinner, walk into town to eat at a restaurant on Hastings or, if you brought fishing gear, see if you can catch something from the jetty. You’ll also find plenty of opportunities to try snorkeling, paddleboarding, and kayaking along the riverfront. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This fabulous villa is located within the Champions Ridge enclave at Maua Lani Resort on Hawaii's Big Island. Built in a Polynesian style, the villa offers an extraordinary balance of lavish privacy and convenient access to the resort's world-class amenities. Its private outdoor areas and ample interiors feature high-end amenities for dining, entertainment, and relaxation (including a large home movie theater), and all six bedrooms feature king beds, making it an ideal choice for multiple couples, family reunions, or executive retreats.

A lovely courtyard with koi pond graces front entrance, while the back terrace features the villa's namesake pool. Sweeping views of the golf course and lush coastline extend toward the Pacific horizon and majestic volcano peaks. The broad lanai provides a cool setting for lounging and dining in the ocean breeze, with a wet bar, grill, and dining table for six, and an elevated spa invites you to soothing soaks under the sun or stars.

Wide accordion doors fuse the terrace with the interior, forming a 3000-square-foot space for entertaining guests or relaxing with loved-ones. The open kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and abundant prep space, and serves multiple dining areas including a beautiful formal dining room for eight. A cavernous home theater seats fifteen for movie night.

Four of the villa's king bedrooms feature ensuite bathrooms, while the other two share a bathroom between them. All of the bedrooms enjoy TVs, air conditioning, and ceiling fans, and several have walk-in closets. The master suite has both interior and alfresco showers, as well as a soaking tub, and there is an additional queen bed connected to the master bedroom's walk-in closet, which enjoys a private courtyard entrance.

The Blue Lagoon has ample garage space and comes with a four-seater golf cart. In the immediate vicinity, the exclusive Champions Ridge community comprises 23.5 acres of private land and features Hawaii's first eighteen-hole putting course, just minutes from your door. Your vacation rental also includes access to the Mauna Lani Beach Club and (at extra cost) the resort's world-class spa, sports facilities, and two championship golf courses.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

HAWAII TAX ID #:TA-197-596-0576-01

listing.listing_description:
Overlooking the sixth fairway of the Francis H. l'i Brown Golf Course, this private Hawaiian luxury rental is the perfect home for a golf vacation with friends, or an island retreat with the family. Located within the Mauna Lani Resort in the exclusive oceanfront community of Ke Kailani, this four bedroom oasis is ready to deliver an unforgettable Hawaiian holiday experience.

Beautiful dark walnut is used throughout the villa for cabinetry, window and door trim, furniture, and other accents. Muted earth tone flooring, tray ceilings with lighting, and off-white walls keep the interior spaces bright and open, while the dark wood directs your attention to the villa’s many features. The earthy colour scheme contrasts well with the vibrant greens of the gardens, and shimmering blue of the skyline. The living room, dining area, and kitchen are all part of a grand open concept area. The living room’s “L” shaped couch divides its space without restricting the overall flow. The kitchen uses a breakfast bar to separate its space from the formal dining area. Perfectly laid out, the main room is an ideal spot for entertaining and socializing with family and friends.

Outside, in the lush coastal environment, you’ll find sun loungers, a hot tub, alfresco dining, and all surrounding the infinity swimming pool. Palm trees and shrubbery outline the property lines, providing privacy while remaining inconspicuous enough to leave the beautiful view intact. The villa’s indoor features include, a fully equipped kitchen, formal dining for eight, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, satellite and cable television, parking, and more. Each of the four bedrooms at Ke Kailani Estate have king size beds and ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers. 

After a round of golf, head over to one of the nearby beaches and cool off with a swim in the ocean. Pauoa Bay, Holoholokai, and Hapuna Beaches are all within a few short miles of the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist. 

Set high on Queenstown Hill, Villa de Luxe offers breathtaking views day and night, year-round. Nearly every room of this contemporary South Island vacation rental looks out over the glassy waters of Lake Wakatipu and the rugged peaks of The Remarkables. A central location makes it easy to spend a holiday with family and friends here, skiing or exploring lively Queenstown.

Take in the fresh air from balconies facing the mountains or a private outdoor lounge area with a firepit and barbecue. Watch the stars come out from an al-fresco hot tub, perfectly positioned to give views of the lake, or watch a favorite show on the Sky TV. Other high-tech amenities include an iPod docking station, sound system, Wi-Fi and security system.

Rendered in glass and metal, Villa de Luxe has a sleek, contemporary look. The living room, dining area and fully equipped kitchen in its open-plan great room are spacious enough for everyone to gather and enjoy the views, cozy up to the fireplace or prepare an après-ski feast. Refined furnishings by a top local interior designer make a stylish statement while still letting the views be the star.

Each of the three bedrooms at this luxury property has an en-suite bathroom. There are two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own balcony and 180-degree views, and one bedroom with two twin beds.

The location of Villa de Luxe in the Belfast Terrace area puts guests within walking distance of the shops, restaurants and nightlife of Queenstown, as well as attractions like the casino and gardens. Relive your honeymoon with a romantic cruise on a vintage steamship, or perfect your swing on one of two nearby golf courses. When it’s winter in New Zealand, the slopes of the Coronet Peak ski area are only 15 minutes from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Waves lap at the shore and Gerroa Beach sweeps around just below this Hamptons-inspired retreat on a surf-happy stretch of the Australian coast. This house was made to entertain, with its generously proportioned rooms and a waterfront deck with space for the whole family. Walk to a coffee shop and let the caffeine fuel a surf or boogie-boarding session on the seasonally patrolled beach.

Watch the tide go in and out from sun-splashed decks with sitting and dining areas, an outdoor kitchen with a built-in barbecue, and a hot tub that’s a wonderful spot to see the stars come out. Or grab one of the villa’s surfboards, boogie boards, stand-up paddleboard, and bikes to explore the bay and along the shoreline.

Sunshine bounces off the villa’s crisp white walls and glows against the 2 sandstone fireplaces. There are 2 living areas, 2 dining areas, and a fully equipped kitchen with vintage-inspired fixtures and an inviting breakfast bar. Wicker seating, striped throws, and the views through walls of windows are constant reminders that you’re at the beach.

Follow the steps down from the deck, walk across the grass, and you’re on Gerroa Beach, where you’ll find relatively gentle waves that are kind to new surfers, lifeguards on patrol during the summer, and an area by the river with calm water perfect for younger kids to play in. Walk or bike to nearby restaurants or get a takeout coffee to bring on a stroll along a coastal trail.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Have an adventure at this sporty, modern home located in the rain forest, just 5 minutes from Byron Bay. Get competitive on the tennis court, rugby field, or pool table. Swim a few laps while the kids bounce on the trampoline. Later, rejuvenate in the hot tub while you enjoy the sunset over the ridge. Then, grab tropical cocktails at a beachfront bar on Main Beach in Byron Bay.  

Set on 100 acres of rolling hillside and rain forest, this villa offers a true escape for those who wish to embrace Australia’s wild side. Sleek architecture is the perfect contrast to the rugged estate. However, the interior decor pays homage with rustic features like stone, wood, and cork accent walls. The kitchen uses white marble to create a clean, bright space that is sure to inspire your inner chef. After dinner, curl up by the fireplace or stretch out in the media room and watch a movie with the family.  

Start your morning bright and early on Byron Bay’s Main Beach. If you can manage the early hike, the sunrise from Byron Bay Lighthouse is well-worth the 45-minute trek. On your way back to the beach, stop by Fisherman’s Lookout and watch the surfers catch some morning waves. If you’re feeling inspired, Main Beach is a great place to take your first surfing lesson. Later, check out the pubs, nightclubs, and breweries on Jonson St.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Waves sweep a stretch of untouched sand in front of this half-rustic, half-modern designer villa in the Bay of Islands. Wood-paneled floors and ceilings envelop the great room for a cozy vibe, while glass walls offer up ocean views. The 2-minute walk to the beach means you can start the day with a meditative wade and finish with a glass of wine sipped with your toes in the sand.

 

Though the location of this vacation rental is private enough to feel like your own deserted island in New Zealand, the villa is ready to pamper with al-fresco living and dining areas, a gas barbecue, and, inside, a smart TV, Wi-Fi, and a fireplace. A Nespresso machine and baby equipment will please family members of all ages.

 

This luxury lodge is laid out in two sections, each with a gently sloping roof and fold-away glass walls. The wood paneling on the ceiling and floors means sunlight casts a golden glow across the open-concept living room, a dining table for 12, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

 

Otaha Beachfront Lodge has 2 master suites with king beds and ocean views, 2 bedrooms with 2 twin beds each, and one bedroom with a queen bed. All 5 bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. Like the great room, the bedrooms get a serene yet stylish vibe from botanical-print wallpaper, geometric-print area rugs and honey-toned wood floors.

 

From the lodge’s snug spot nestled between 2 hills, a honeymoon from the everyday, it’s a 2-minute walk to surfing on the beach or hiking the trails that wind up and down the landscape. Make a short drive to stand in the mist of Rainbow Falls or learn about the region’s past at the Whangaroa County Museum. And do stop for seafood during your holiday; the town of Kaeo was named for the mussels found in the area’s rivers.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Delight in a quintessential Bali welcome at The Rose. Part of the oceanfront Pandawa Cliff Estate community, this stunning luxury property boasts water views, a full staff and a location close to beaches, dining, nightlife and more. Reserve its four bedrooms for a tropical holiday with friends or book its sister villa, The Pala, and host a family reunion or destination wedding.

Your stay at The Rose includes the services of a private chef, butler, housekeeper and driver. Get your fill of sunshine in outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, lounging and dining spaces, and a barbecue, or sneak off to the garden with a book. If you’ll be entertaining, a bar area and a media room with satellite television and a sound system make it a snap.

The thoughtful design of this contemporary vacation rental lets you decide whether to savor open-air living or flip on the air conditioning. Sliding glass doors connect the open-concept living and dining areas to the terrace, and details like polished stone floors and wicker furniture add to the breezy ambience. While there is a fully equipped kitchen, the chef will take care of breakfast, and you can select other meals from a menu.

The villa has two master suites with king beds, including one with a honeymoon-worthy al-fresco shower, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and open to an outdoor space, whether a terrace or balcony.

Guests of The Rose are welcome to use the shared exercise room, spa, and tennis and squash courts at the Pandawa Cliff Estate during your stay. If you’d like to explore the surrounding Bukit area, make the short drive to nearby Pandawa Beach, sample restaurants and nightlife in the town of Nusa Dua, tee off at the New Kuta Golf Club and marvel at the sea temple at Uluwatu.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

With sunset views over the Pacific, lush landscaping and a beautiful course-side setting, Kaunaoa Halia 10B makes the postcards come to life. Not only does the private four-bedroom villa enchant with elegant tropical style, but guests have access to the exclusive country club facilities at Mauna Kea Resort. It’s just a short walk from the villa to two of Hawaii’s best beaches, and golfers won’t be able to resist playing both the Mauna Kea course and the private Weiskopf Par 3 course.

The townhouse-style villa opens to a private backyard with views of the Mauna Kea golf course and, from the second-floor balcony, views of the ocean. A covered lanai has both sitting and dining areas, as well as a gas barbecue, and beyond, there’s an inviting lawn with chaise longues, pool and hot tub. During your stay, you’ll enjoy access to the amenities at the Kauna’oa complex, including pools, a fitness center, spa, golf course and lounges and cabanas. Don’t miss the perks at the Mauna Kea Resort, either, from the oceanfront pools, fitness centers and preferred parking to reduced rates at the golf course and tennis club.

The luxe interiors at Kaunaoa Halia 10B will quickly make you feel at ease, with refined finishes and spacious layouts. A pair of matching sofas in the living room, bookended by two armchairs, means there’s plenty of room for the whole family, while sculptural wall art and bright throw pillows add whimsy and color. The fully equipped kitchen welcomes cooks with rich mahogany floors and gourmet Viking appliances and accommodates non-cooks with seating at a breakfast bar and in two leather club chairs.

Each of the villa’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and flat-screen television. The master suite has a king bed and spa-worthy outdoor shower, and there’s a second bedroom with a king bed as well. The other bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively. Many of the bedrooms open to lanais or balconies, so you can begin your day by stepping out to feel the island breeze or fall asleep to the sound of the ocean in the distance.

From the villa, you can walk or drive to Hapuna Beach and Mauna Kea Beach, both 5 minutes or less by car—and some of the island’s best beaches. It’s a 15-minute walk to the golf course, shopping and dining at Mauna Kea Resort and a 6-minute drive to even more shopping and dining options at Hapuna Prince Resort. See more of the island by driving to Mauna Lani, 15 minutes away, Waimea, 13 miles away, or Waikoloa, about 15 miles away. At the end of your stay, plan to fly out of Kona International Airport, 27 miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-147-110-9120-01

listing.listing_description:
In the Canggu district of southern Bali where humble farmers can be found tending their rice paddies, the three-bedroom luxury estate Villa Levi lies peacefully under an enormous tree ready to host groups of up to six epicurean travelers. The villa is comprised of pavilions centered around a vast grassy terrace and large swimming pool. Fully staffed with stalwart professionals and wanting for nothing by way of amenities, picking Villa Levi could not be an easier choice for your dream Indonesian vacation.

This villa has it all with a multitude of flat-screen televisions connected to the latest sound systems. The home has both air conditioning and Wi-Fi throughout to keep guests both cool and connected. Staying in shape is tough, though the villa’s on-site gym makes it a little easier, along with the spa for relaxing afterward. Outdoors, guests will find a large swimming pool adjacent to an inviting lounge area, though there are also two other terraces to lounge around in, one on the roof and one riverside.

The villa successfully integrates avant-garde style and earthy elements affording guests the opportunity to live in style while never forgetting the raw beauty of nature that surrounds them. Timber and local stone feature prominently throughout the home and the rooms are replete with colorful Indonesian artworks and mysterious antiques, which engender an appreciation for the local culture. The kitchen comes fully equipped with the latest in appliances and an experienced chef.

To describe the guest accommodations found at Villa Levi as luxurious would be an understatement. The bedrooms boast individual climate control, sitting areas, dressing rooms, televisions and DVD players, security safes and even mini-bars. Two of the three rooms each have romantic king size canopy beds, and the remaining room offers two twin beds. Additionally, the bedrooms have direct access to the gardens or a balcony.

Bali is full of adventure and new experiences for all, starting with Echo Beach where one can catch dazzling sunsets while enjoying an Es Kelapa Muda, a yummy chilled green coconut. The bright lights of nearby Seminyak attract largely upscale clientele to partake in the lively nightlife and dine in its gourmet restaurants. For those few who appreciate culture, there’s no shortage of art galleries in Seminyak, which showcases both traditional and contemporary Balinese pieces.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

The beach is more popular with locals than tourists (not safe for swimming in most sections), but is a great spot for building sandcastles or to watch the sunset as you sip a cocktail from one of the many beachside bars.

listing.listing_description:
Metallic frames outline colorful artwork while floor-to-ceiling glass frames bird’s-eye views of the Melbourne skyline at this sleek penthouse. Set behind the gold-tinted windows at the top of the Zen Tower and laid out around an open-plan great room, this urban nest is a gallery-like hideaway above downtown. Take a walking tour or shop on your own at Queen Victoria Market, 5 minutes away.

Your holiday begins with a personal welcome and gourmet basket, and an on-call concierge can answer questions during your stay. Stretch out in front of the Apple TV or check in via Wi-Fi at the end of a day exploring the city; use the tower’s shared indoor swimming pool, hot tub, sauna, and gym; or request to volley with friends and family on the shared tennis court.

Boldly patterned area rugs divide the great room into a living area, lounging area, dining area for eight, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. A sumptuous leather sectional and lounge chairs invite you to settle in, while an oversized flower print above the dining table brings a little bit of the garden into your perch high above the ground.

This vacation rental has a master suite with a king bed, private en-suite bathroom, and city views. A glass wall separates the bedroom area from the stand-alone bathtub, giving you the luxury of taking in the skyline as you soak. The other two bedrooms each have a queen bed and access to a hall bathroom.

Zen Tower is a 5-minute walk from Queen Victoria Market, where you can take a walking—and tasting—tour, pick up fresh ingredients for a meal, or catch a busker performance, and the photogenic exterior (plus transit hub) of Melbourne Central Railway Station. Delve into Australia’s history at the Immigration Museum and natural history at the Melbourne Museum. And pop into the city’s laneways to discover everything from coffee spots to honeymoon-worthy restaurants to street art.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Don’t be afraid to unleash your wild side at this serene Balinese villa on the northern Kuta coast. Sip tea next to the koi pond while you catch up on some reading. Let the full-staff cater to your every whim. When you’re ready to party, turn up the karaoke machine in the lounge bar or swim-up for a drink at the pool. Later, move the group to Seminyak’s beachfront nightclub scene.

Villa Elite Tara mixes airy, traditional Balinese architecture with cutting-edge contemporary design to create a space that celebrates luxury and Bali’s natural surroundings. Warm woods and vibrant textures deliver a comfortable setting for socializing, while elements like the gardens, koi pond, and swimming pool all offer serenity. After an alfresco dinner prepared by a private chef, keep the festivities going in the spacious outdoor lounge or hang out at the bar inside.

Known for its appearance in the film “Eat, Pray, Love,” Padang Padang Beach is one of Bali’s finest secluded coves. Protected by cliffs and coral, it feels delightfully cut-off from the rest of the world. It is also a perfect opportunity to rent a surfboard and sign-up for a one-time surfing lesson right on the beachfront. After a day on the beach, take your camera to Tanah Lot Sea Temple and see if you can snap a few pictures at sunset. The view is incredible.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Trijitrap is a stunning luxury villa in Seminyak, on the Indonesian Island of Bali. Designed to modernize the classic grandeur of the Javanese plantation house called "Huis Tijtrap," the result is the ideal sanctuary for large families, groups of friends, or destination wedding guests seeking privacy and spiritual tranquility during a Balinese adventure.

The villa's beautifully symmetrical design features a central, open-air pavilion that overlooks the swimming pool and transports you back in time. The wooden pool deck, punctuated by tall palms, is perfect for spending long afternoons in the tropical sun. In the pavilion, high, vaulted ceilings cover a deluxe lounge, where you'll sip cocktails together in the evening. Verandas flank the pavilion on both the ground and upper floors. The property is nestled in lush garden and is beautifully illuminated at night.

From the pavilion, you'll pass into the villa's open-plan interior living area. Here, you'll dine at the beautiful table for twelve, or relax in the lounge beside the delightful atrium, with its bust of the Buddha and tranquil pool—a soothing core emitting peace throughout the home. The décor throughout is elegantly minimalist, with exquisite touches of traditional Javanese influence inflecting the fresh, luminous, contemporary feel.

All six bedrooms have king beds and ensuite bathrooms. The two master suites, on the upper floor of the main house, open to the veranda. The first includes its own sumptuous living lounge, while the second is adjacent to the upstairs TV den. The master bathrooms feature stand-alone showers and bathtubs. There are two bedrooms on the ground floor of the main house opening to the lower veranda, and two in the guesthouse opening to lovely stepping-stone paths to the pool. One of these last rooms, in addition to its king bed, includes two elevated twin beds, making for a charming family suite. The four last rooms feature alfresco stand-alone showers and bathtubs.

From Villa Tjitrap, Seminyak Beach is just a thirteen-minute walk from your door, and several other beaches are a short drive away. Families with kids will love the Splash Waterpark at Finns Recreation Club or a day at Waterbom Bali. And for an unforgettable experience of Bali's natural and spiritual beauty, visit Tanah Lot Sea Temple.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A pair of glass towers with thatched crowns compose this stunning contemporary villa in the South Kuta region of Bali. Situated within the fully-staffed Dayu Mirah Resort, the home includes a private infinity pool, expansive outdoor living areas, and sweeping views of the forested hills. Drive 6 kilometers to Pandawa (one of Bali’s “secret beaches”), and experience the sublime beauty of Uluwatu Temple.

Villa Lingkar balances exquisite modern design with evocative traditional features, including a wooden footbridge connecting the towers. Sun loungers, a chair swing, and an alfresco shower accompany the lagoon-like swimming pool, while a canopied daybed offers a cool haven for restful afternoons. In the main tower, a shaded living/dining area with gourmet kitchen occupies the bottom level, beneath the master suite with private balcony. The other tower features a guest suite on each level. Glass walls infuse the rooms with natural light and panoramic views.

The gated Dayu Mirah Resort offers security and serenity within easy reach of some of southern Bali’s finest destinations. Take a short drive over the South Kuta hills to Pandawa Beach, known for its soft sands and swimmer-friendly waters, or head west for the famed surf breaks of Suluban. Right beside Suluban is Uluwatu, a majestic sea temple regarded as one of the most important sites in Balinese Hinduism. Travelers can also choose from myriad watersport and eco-adventure outfits, as well as 2 golf courses in the vicinity.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Hamsa is a beautiful four-bedroom villa on the south shore of Bali's Bukit peninsula. Nestled on high ground above the water's edge, the villa enjoys panoramic views of the Indian Ocean from its master bedroom and pool terrace. Blending contemporary and traditional styles, the villa offers a unique interpretation of Balinese luxury, enhanced by outstanding chef services, security, and a villa manager. Sharing an ample estate with neighboring Villa Soham, the two villas can be rented individually or together for large family reunions or destination wedding guests.

An exquisite swimming pool runs along the ample terrace between the master suite and main interior, inviting you to plunge into its refreshing waters and sunbathe on loungers facing the horizon, while an alfresco dining table welcomes delicious meals in the shade of a rustic pergola. Glass doors open from the veranda to the cool interior, where vaulted wood ceilings shelter a sumptuous lounge and dining area. Glass walls flood the space with brilliant daylight and sunset hues, while a pendant halo casts an enchanting luminosity over nighttime feasts.

The secluded master suite enjoys expansive ocean views from its king-size bed and private balcony, and its ensuite bathroom includes an alfresco shower and soaking tub. The three guest suites all feature king beds that can be converted into two twin-size beds. Air conditioning, ceiling fans, TVs, and ensuite bathrooms in every suite ensure privacy and comfort for all guests.

While Villa Hamsa's extreme southern location offers unparalleled views and delicious seclusion, it's also within minutes of some of Bali's top attractions. Drive a few minutes to the beaches at Pandaw, Nusa Dua, and Jimbaran, or play an unforgettable round at nearby New Kuta Golf. Travel about fourteen kilometers to Uluwata Sea Temple or the resort and watersport destination Tanjung Benoa. Ngurah Rai International Airport is less than eighteen kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

Villa Kalyani is a phenomenal Balinese estate near Berawa Beach, constructed with remarkable style and possessing an abundance of first-rate features making it in many ways more like a luxury resort than a private villa. The villa boasts five private guests’ suites with room for twelve guests and includes child-friendly spaces and amenities. Guests staying here will also be given full access to the elite Canggu social club, as well as VIP treatment at the local Townhouse Café & Lounge.

A staff composed of a butler, chef and security guard will look after the villa and its guests, to ensure their total satisfaction. The estate boasts two swimming pools – a magnificent seventy-footer and a plunge, an outdoor cinema and a lovely alfresco dining area with a grill and bar near a furnished terrace to really get the party started. Inside, this home has another theater and bar, as well as an amazing party room with a dance floor and a professional DJ booth for when the party moves indoors.

Villa Kalyani is composed of two buildings, a U-shaped main building with two floors and a guest pavilion with one floor. The interiors are quite contemporary and inspiring with an almost minimalist elegance found in stylish modern furnishings and contemporary art. A gourmet kitchen has been designed with both grace and vision as well as nearly every appliance under the sun.

The five en-suite bedrooms have been spread out to maximize privacy with two rooms located in a separate guest pavilion. One of the two master suites boasts access to a private garden and two balconies, while the other master suite has a private entrance to the terrace. Each room has king size beds, with the exception of one equipped with two twin beds, as well as flat-screen televisions.

Here are a few tips for travelers to this enchanted area of the globe. Seafood is paramount in Indonesian fare and fishermen sell their daily catch at Nelayan Beach. During your stay, be sure to enjoy the variety of entertainment and fitness options for all ages at nearby Finns Recreation Club. Nirwana Bali Golf Course is also close to Villa Kalyani and is one of the most famous courses in all of Asia, uniquely built adjacent to Bali’s iconic sea temple of Tanah Lot. Go ahead, take a swing!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sunshine and shade are at play in the partly covered courtyard and pared-down interiors of this contemporary home 1 minute from Sunrise Beach. Wood panels arch over the al-fresco lounge to create a respite from the sun, and louvered windows filter light as it streams onto honey-toned wood floors. Pick up coffee from trendy Hastings Street for a dawn stroll along the golden sand of Sunrise Beach.

 Spend sunny days splashing in the villa’s pool, playing on the trampoline, napping in the shaded sitting area, and tossing dinner on the barbecue to enjoy at the al-fresco dining table for six—preferably paired with an Australian bottle from the wine fridge inside. The high-tech entertainment includes a streaming TV and Wi-Fi, but there are also guitars and a library of books, games, and movies for simpler pleasures.

 The glass wall between great room and terrace folds away, giving you the luxury of one seamless indoor-outdoor living space. A cloud-like tufted sectional sets a playful tone in the living area, and there’s seating for eight around the dining table. A fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar at the other end of the room opens to yet another outdoor space.

 This vacation rental has one master bedroom with a king bed, private en-suite bathroom, and views of a nature reserve. The other two bedrooms each have a queen bed and share access to a hall bathroom.

 It’s a 1-minute drive or 7-minute walk from this holiday home to Sunrise Beach, whose golden shores are almost entirely surrounded by national-park land teeming with palms and koalas. And it’s a 7-minute drive to family-friendly Noosa Main Beach and Hastings Street, lined with cafés serving excellent coffee and restaurants serving honeymoon-worthy fare. Nature lovers will want to explore Noosa National Park while avid players tee off at two nearby golf courses.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This luxury holiday home offers views of rice fields and distant mountains and features plenty of family-friendly amenities, making it one of our top villas in Bali for families traveling with children. A top tropical holiday destination, the island of Bali offers a welcoming atmosphere, unique culture and stunning beaches.

On hot days, cool down in the large infinity-edge pool that sits along a timber deck outfitted with sunbeds and mature frangipani trees. The entertainment room is equipped with toys and games for wee ones and is a cozy spot to watch a movie, while there’s another television room/study on the rooftop for those looking for some quiet time. Also on the rooftop, is an open-air terrace lounge space complete with daybeds and sun umbrellas.

Within, the home features a cutting-edge design scheme with stone walls, contemporary accents and elegant wood touches. The living room is sleek with modern furnishings and tropical plants and flows into the open-sided dining area. Meanwhile, the kitchen is fully equipped with all the appliances you need to craft a home-cooked meal—but you won’t need to lift a finger! Your stay here includes the services of a chef, butler and housekeeper.

There are six bedrooms that can accommodate up to 12 guests in this villa, including three master suites. Five of the bedrooms offer king size beds and en-suite bathrooms with tubs and showers, while the remaining guest room is ideal for children.

Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/misha-gillingham-wildluxe-diary/)

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing_cancellation_info.cancellation: Cancel up to 95 days before your trip and only pay 50% of the total accommodation fees for the reservation. Cancel within 95 days of the trip and the reservation is non-refundable.

listing.listing_description:
Get your fill of modern architecture as you swim and barbecue at Eagle Retreat. This sleek residence elevates the classic A-frame home—almost literally—and fills it with pared-down furnishings for a chic backdrop to holiday snaps. While the yard feels private and the views are of bushland, it’s less than a 3 minute walk to the beach, shops, restaurants and more in downtown Casuarina.

 

Slide open the retreat’s glass walls to reach the backyard and its freshwater plunge pool, lounging and dining areas, and gas barbecue. Cue up a favorite album on the Sonos sound system to set the mood as you fire up the grill or, after a day out at the beach, unwind with a glass of Australian wine in front of the smart TV and Wi-Fi.

 

Eagle Retreat looks like an A-frame house set on top of a box, and the result is a double-height wall of glass that bathes the great room in light. Open the walls to feel the breeze as you stretch out on the sofa and whip up meals in the gleaming black and white kitchen, which is fully equipped, then serve friends and family at a dining table with banquette seating or the breakfast bar.

 

This vacation rental has one bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and 2 bedrooms with queen beds and access to a hall bathroom. It can accommodate six guests, or you can give yourself the luxury of having it all to yourself on a honeymoon-style getaway.

 

With Casuarina Beach and Cabarita Beach just a 4-minute and a 6-minute drive from the house, respectively, you can watch the waves crash onto the sand on a sunrise stroll and be back for breakfast. Plan a canoe trip or walk in nearby Cudgen Nature Reserve or a round at Pottsville Golf Course, then reward yourself with dinner in Casuarina, only 6 minutes away by car.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Steal away to a quiet yet stylish Bali retreat at Abaca Villa Kadek. Set amid the rice fields outside Seminyak, this elegant five-bedroom vacation rental is a wonderfully tranquil getaway for a group of family or friends. It can also be reserved with the two neighboring Abaca villas to accommodate up to 32 guests if you’d like to share your holiday with everyone.

Your stay at Villa Kadek includes the services of a villa manager and housekeeper, as well as an American or Asian breakfast each day. From there, it’s up to you whether you want to catch up on reading in a lounger or cool off in the swimming pool. After serving dinner from the barbecue, spend evenings unwinding with the help of the cable TV, Wi-Fi and wine fridge.

With open-sided living and dining areas and a flowing open-concept layout, the villa creates an ambience of laid-back luxury. Wicker sofas, stone floors and wood accents only add to the feeling of being immersed in the landscape. On the practical side, there’s a fully equipped kitchen that will make light work of lunch and dinner preparations.

Villa Kadek has four bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with a queen bed. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and several have honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as al-fresco showers or private balconies.

Though the villa feels secluded, it’s only a short drive from several beaches and temples, the closest of which is Petitenget Beach. Families traveling with kids can spend a day at nearby Waterbom Bali Waterslides; avid golfers won’t want to miss the chance to play at the Nirwana Bali Golf Course by Greg Norman. For tempting shopping, a choice of spas and great restaurants, make the short drive to Seminyak Square.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sunbathe by the infinity pool, descend the stairs to Clontarf Beach, and lounge on the veranda with 180-degree views of Middle Harbor. This contemporary villa near Sydney balances sophisticated artistry, high-end technology, and kid-friendly features including a rumpus room and outdoor trampoline. Walk to the marina to set sail on the harbor or play a round at nearby Manly Golf Club.

Outdoor living areas on all 4 levels emphasize the open-air delights of the Northern Beaches. On the main level, the wrap-around veranda boasts panoramic harbor views and a pergola-style cover with retractable canopy. The pool terrace extends from the lower level of the home (off the guest bedrooms), accompanied by a trampoline in the yard and a staircase leading down to the beach.

The open-concept interior features a cozy lounge area with TV and fireplace, a chef-grade kitchen with breakfast bar, and a luminous dining area for 8. Sliding glass doors create a breezy, semi-alfresco ambiance, while central air conditioning keeps you cool when necessary. The décor is a harmony of natural wood, earthy leather accents, and soothing, sea-inspired blues, deftly enhanced by designer light fixtures and gallery-worthy artwork.

An elevator complements the beautiful floating staircase between levels. On the upper floor, the master and primary guest suites enjoy ensuite bathrooms and private balconies with harbor views. The master additionally enjoys a private lounge, and its bathroom includes a soaking tub. Two kid-friendly guestrooms are on the pool level, sharing a bathroom and playroom with TV.

In addition to Clontarf Beach beneath you, you’re within minutes by car of Castle Rock Beach, and a short stroll from Clontarf Marina. Walking and biking trails abound in the area, and you’re an easy drive from Mosman Village, Taronga Zoo, and Balgowlah.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
All bookings with travel dates taking place after January 1st 2019, will be subject to a 4.712% General Excise Tax & a 10.25% Transient Accommodations Tax. All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.

Nestled in alongside Mauna Kea Resort’s beautifully maintained golf course, this luxurious tropical villa boasts amazing ocean views, vibrant and lush gardens, and an interesting, modern take on Hawaiian beach architecture. The Big Island is home to some of Hawaii’s most sought-after natural features, and golf, hiking, water sports, and nature tours are great ways to get out and enjoy the dream-like environment. You’ll find everything you need on the resort property, including pristine white-sand beachfront, just a few minutes from home.

Fairway South is a bright and exciting villa, employing a modern-retro architectural style, mixed with the trademarks of Hawaiian beach house design to create a unique and memorable vacation destination. Floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors stretch the length of ocean-facing, living room wall, inviting the fresh breeze to flow freely within. Inside, you’ll love the bright and inviting color scheme, high-end electronics, and designer furniture. Beautiful teak and cherry wood, floral patterns, and stone accents provide that quintessential Hawaii-vibe, while the villa’s contemporary design puts an elegant spin on Fairway’s atmosphere.

Outside, you’ll love the generous amount of covered patio space and outdoor, furnished living areas. From there, you’ll find gorgeous green lawns leading to the swimming pool, hot tub, and on to the incredible ocean view. At dinner, you’ll have the choice between the formal dining area inside, or the scenic alfresco setting on the terrace. And, when it’s time to retire for the evening, both king bedrooms come with en-suite bathrooms, while the two queen’s share a bathroom, and all have air conditioning.

The Mauna Kea Resort is home to one of the Big Island’s most beautiful beachfront areas. With crystal clear, calm waters, Mauna Kea Beach is perfect for first-time snorkelers and family suitable swimming. If there’s a golfer in the group, Mauna Kea is home to thirty-six holes of incredible, oceanside golf. And, there’s restaurants, spa services, tennis, a fitness center, and more, all within Mauna Kea’s beautiful estate.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: At Extra Cost - advance notice may be required:

ul.li: The rate for the Mauna Kea Collection DOES NOT include access to use the Club at Mauna Kea facilities. Guests have the option to include this amenity with their reservation for an additional fee. Please note: we will need at least 6 weeks notice prior to arrival if guests would like this privilege. They will also be required to fill out and return a signed registration form before any arrangements to use the Club facilities will be approved.

Along with the complete refurbishing of the The Mauna Kea Beach Hotel, a fee for guest identification cards and a daily fee to access the hotel facilities will be charged. This policy applies to anyone age 14 or older and will be limited to six (6) people per reservation
Please note that access could be restricted at any time by the Mauna Kea Resort
